Description: MCP Tools Disappear Mid-Session
Claude Code Loses MCP Server Connection
Duplicate Team Project entries in dashboard
User isolation failure in dashboard
GraphAdapter 403 on node creation
ginko epic list returns No epics found
ginko graph load creates duplicate nodes
Epics default to Status: Not Started
ginko sprint create TypeError crash
Task/sprint status changes don't persist
ginko log fails to sync to graph
ginko handoff breaks in non-TTY
Insights page shows No Insights Available
Dashboard doesn't persist last-accessed project
Task assignee is freeform text not dropdown
Tasks not auto-assigned when work begins
No team status view on dashboard
Bidirectional sync broken (one-way only)
ginko graph load reports No new content
ginko team status shows No team members
Identity mismatch: local config vs API auth
No client-side validation for empty task IDs
Staleness false positive after sync
ginko sprint create --yes crashes
ginko epic creates duplicate entities and loses tasks
